tab.name: intro
tab.label: Summary
tab.content: Stratford-upon-Avon is the city of the bard, renowned as Shakespeare's birthplace. Perhaps because of this it has kept much of the charm and character of a country market town while playing host to so many thousands of tourists annually. Of course, if you want to find some of the hidden corners and interesting details of Stratford that the tourist crowds seldom see you would be wise to try this Treasure Hunt.

tab.name: details
tab.label: Hunt Info
tab.content:
The pack includes an easy and hard version of the main treasure trail, a set of extra explorer puzzles and a bonus round.

Duration 2 hours to a full day, not including breaks.

Suitability Suitable for any size of group from 1 to 8, good for families. The streets of Stratford are accessible to all, and any areas included in the trails should be freely accessible in daylight hours.

Requirements Just a pencil and paper, and a sensible pair of shoes.
